GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST/api/topics.description: inserts a new topic into the db with values slug, description

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles
queries: topic: filters results to that topic

POST /api/articles/.description: inserts a new article into the db with values : authur, title, topic, body, article_img_url. article_img_url will set to defualt if not passed. Author and topic must match values found in the db

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves the user object with value :username

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article object with value :article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the an array containing comment objects for article with value :article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment into the db for article with value :article_id, returns the inserted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes property by +/- newVotes for article with value :article_id, returns the updated article object

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes property by +/- newVotes for comment with value :comment_id, returns the updated comment object
